subject: Request information
description_text:
Good morning, I would like to know the delivery times and the shipping cost
to Italy for the product Plus-x2-p2-h2. Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Mattia Parlato,     The specific delivery time will depend on the shipping method you choose, with an estimated delivery time of 5-10 days. You can place your order via this link.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals?variant=50297650970938
